original_text: The woman also with whom man shall lie with seed of copulation, they shall both bathe themselves in water, and be unclean until the even.
korean_text: 남녀가 동침하여 설정하였거든 둘 다 물로 몸을 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: The woman also with whom man shall lie with seed of copulation
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 남자가 정액을 가지고 동침할 여인

sentences.original_text: they shall both bathe themselves in water
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 둘 다 물로 몸을 씻어야 하며

sentences.original_text: and be unclean until the even
